DiscussionContent.NewComment: Be civil, avoid spamming and low-effort comments. See the discussion guidelines in the VocaDB wiki.

EntryCreate.FoundCoverArtist: A "Cover artist" was found in the entry. Please change the artist type to "Producer" if this is an original song.
EntryCreate.FoundPossibleDuplicates: 일치할 수도 있는 문서를 데이터베이스에서 찾았습니다. 중복되는 문서가 아님을 확인해주세요.
EntryCreate.Name: 이름 (최소 한 개 이상)
EntryCreate.NameHelp: 이름이 원곡의 이름이 영어가 아닌 이름이거나 (예: 일본어, 한국어 등) 언어를 특정할 수 없을 경우 영어 이외 언어 항목에 기입해주시기 바랍니다. 가능하다면 로마자화된 이름도 입력해주시길 부탁드립니다. 만약 공식 이름이 영어로 된 이름이거나 알려진 영어 번역이 있다면 해당 이름을 영어 이름 항목에 입력해주시길 바랍니다.
EntryCreate.NoArtistsToName: Do not enter artist names into the name field. Instead, use the artists list.

EntryDetails.PersonalDescriptionHelp: This field is for artist's personal introduction of the entry. Unlike the description field, this is considered a subjective opinion, possibly written in first person, and may include a limited amount of "marketing speech". Select the author of the description - who wrote it? For entries with multiple involved artists, only one description may be provided, but whenever possible the circle/group can be selected as the author.
EntryDetails.ReportArchivedVersionExplanation: 해당 편집본의 오류 보고. 유저 또한 알림을 받을 것입니다.
EntryDetails.Subject: Subject

EntryEdit.AliasesDesc: '이명'은 문서에서 설명되는 대상의 자주 언급되는 또 다른 이름을 의미합니다. 대부분의 경우 이명은 본래 이름의 번역이 아니지만, 본래 이름의 잘 알려진 번역 또한 이명 항목에 추가될 수 있습니다. 이명 추가에 언어 제한은 없습니다.
EntryEdit.ConcurrentEditWarning: {{0}} also edited this entry {{1}} minute(s) ago.
EntryEdit.ConfirmDelete: Please confirm that you wish to delete this entry. You may provide additional explanation below (optional).
EntryEdit.ConfirmMoveToTrash: Please confirm that you wish to permanently delete this entry. This cannot be undone. You may provide an additional explanation below (optional).
EntryEdit.DefaultLanguageHelp: The language of the official default name for this entry. Usually this is the one that's used most commonly in official sources.
EntryEdit.ExternalLinksQuickHelp:
External links relevant to this entry. Keep in mind no illegal/direct download links will be allowed!

Fill in the URL first, and description and category will be guessed automatically if the domain is known.

Official: artist's official site (usually blogs, websites, Facebook etc.).
Commercial: authorized sales such as Amazon and CDJapan.
Reference: fansites with useful information such as wikis.
Other: for those that don't fit into anything above.
EntryEdit.NameHelp:
If the original name is non-English (for example Japanese), or if the language of the name is unknown, input that into the Non-English name field. If known, input the romanized name as well. If the official name of the entry is in English, or there is a known English translation, input that into the English name field.

Note that you do not need to copy the missing names from others. The system will substitute those when needed. For example, lacking a romanized name, the system will automatically use English.

Additional names can be entered as aliases. See more in the guide.
EntryEdit.SaveWarning: This entry has validation warnings. Are you sure you want to save it as finished?

EntryIndex.Drafts: These entries are marked as drafts which means they are missing some information.
EntryIndex.NoResults: 결과 없음. 다른 검색어를 입력하시거나 구글 커스텀 검색 기능을 사용하시길 바랍니다.

EntryMerge.MergeInfo:
Choose the entry which this one will be merged to. All references will be pointed to that new entry and this entry will be deleted.
Prefer merging the later entry to the earlier one, unless the new entry is finalized while the older one is draft.
EntryMerge.MergeWarning: This action cannot be undone! Please make sure the entries really need to be merged before proceeding.
EntryMerge.ValidationErrorTargetIsLessComplete:
The selected entry seems to be draft while the one being merged from is not.
Prefer merging from the less complete entry to the more complete entry.
EntryMerge.ValidationErrorTargetIsNewer:
The selected entry seems to be newer than the one being merged from.
Prefer merging from newer entry to the older entry.
